body_html:
Hm, I agree with Ed - the change of what you store in Blob is independent from what the API of BlobGetMutableTensor is.

You can store the caffe2::Tensor and still extract intrusivePtr from it if necessary

You can store the caffe2::Tensor and still extract intrusivePtr from it if necessary
body:
Hm, I agree with Ed - the change of what you store in Blob is independent from what the API of BlobGetMutableTensor is.

You can store the caffe2::Tensor and still extract intrusivePtr from it if necessary
